meanings.definition: Repros (noun): Reproductions or copies of something, especially in the context of art or photography.
meanings.sent1: The art gallery displayed beautiful repros of famous paintings.
meanings.sent2: She bought a repro of the classic photograph to hang in her living room.
meanings.sent3: The repros of the artwork were so well done, they almost looked real!
meanings.sent4: Her collection of repros transformed her home into a mini art museum.
meanings.sent5: The repros captured the essence of the original paintings perfectly.

meanings.definition: Repros (verb): To make a reproduction or copy of something.
meanings.sent1: He decided to repro the old family photo to preserve it for future generations.
meanings.sent2: The artist reproed his famous painting to sell affordable copies to fans.
meanings.sent3: She repros her favorite recipes so she can share them with friends.
meanings.sent4: The machine can repro documents quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The students were asked to repro the historical document for their project.
